issue.title: add hint text to Search field in Palette

content.raw:
Yes sure. Thank you Louise for the suggestion. With QLineEdit::placeholderText it is easy to achieve the suggested behaviour by Steffi (text disappears on click, search query remains on delete the help text reappears).

However, when a user clicks the first time on the search tab, the focus is given to the search text field, so there is no hint text. Should I rermove the first focus, so the hint text appears immediately on first search tab click?
